title: Establishes protections for those who enter certain personal service contracts
summary: Establishes protections for those who enter certain personal service contracts relating to the sound recording industry; establishes time limitations on the enforcement of such contracts with the aim of protecting the artist's freedom of expression from unreasonable and unduly restrictive covenants; enacts the "Artistic Freedom Act".
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to certain personal service contracts protections
